data.name: Patrick's Parabox Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the soundtrack to Patrick's Parabox, composed and produced by Priscilla Snow.

Welcome to Patrick's Parabox -- you push a box inside a box... And you're a box, too!

A mix of upbeat and ambient tunes to keep you company while you puzzle your way through the game.
